				<div class="et_pb_blurb_content">
					
					<div class="et_pb_blurb_container">
						<h4 class="et_pb_module_header"><span>2025 News</span></h4>
						<div class="et_pb_blurb_description"><p>The Quench Buggy will be on hand, thanks to Stafford County Utilities. Bring a refillable water bottle for fresh, free hydration!</p>
<p>All event attendees receive one free raffle ticket. Giveaways include a handmade quilt, Riverside Center for the Performing Arts tickets, a gift basket from Tour Stafford, and much more! Additional raffle tickets will be for sale by cash, check, or card at the event. Proceeds benefit Stafford County Public Schools. </p></div>

				<span class="et_pb_image_wrap has-box-shadow-overlay"><div class="box-shadow-overlay"></div><img loading="lazy" decoding="async" width="2560" height="2397" src="https://vcstafford.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/IMG_7805-scaled.webp" alt="The Experience" title="child-drawing" srcset="https://vcstafford.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/IMG_7805-scaled.webp 2560w, https://vcstafford.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/IMG_7805-1280x1199.webp 1280w, https://vcstafford.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/IMG_7805-980x918.webp 980w, https://vcstafford.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/IMG_7805-480x449.webp 480w" sizes="(min-width: 0px) and (max-width: 480px) 480px, (min-width: 481px) and (max-width: 980px) 980px, (min-width: 981px) and (max-width: 1280px) 1280px, (min-width: 1281px) 2560px, 100vw" class="wp-image-1022" /></span>
			</div><div class="et_pb_module et_pb_cta_0 et_pb_promo  et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_promo_description"><h3 class="et_pb_module_header">The Experience</h3><div><p><span style="font-weight: 400;">Via Colori® Stafford! is a two-day, family-friendly event, taking place from 10:00 to 5:00 p.m. Saturday, September 27, through Sunday, September 28, 2025.</span></p>
<p><span>The 2025 event will be held at the <a href="https://staffordairport.com/">Stafford Regional Airport</a>. Accessible parking and portable restrooms will be available. Food vendors will be on-site should you wish to purchase refreshments. The event is free for participating artists and the public, and you’ll find a number of community organizations and sponsor tables to visit, plus activities for children. Artists will be busy creating their chalk paintings on well-spaced squares, so you’ll be able to walk around and watch them in action.</span></p>
<p> </p>
<p><span></span></p></div></div>

				<span class="et_pb_image_wrap has-box-shadow-overlay"><div class="box-shadow-overlay"></div><img loading="lazy" decoding="async" width="2560" height="1920" src="https://vcstafford.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/IMG_6013-scaled.webp" alt="Become An Artist" title="artist-drawing" srcset="https://vcstafford.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/IMG_6013-scaled.webp 2560w, https://vcstafford.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/IMG_6013-1280x960.webp 1280w, https://vcstafford.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/IMG_6013-980x735.webp 980w, https://vcstafford.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/IMG_6013-480x360.webp 480w" sizes="(min-width: 0px) and (max-width: 480px) 480px, (min-width: 481px) and (max-width: 980px) 980px, (min-width: 981px) and (max-width: 1280px) 1280px, (min-width: 1281px) 2560px, 100vw" class="wp-image-1027" /></span>
			</div>
			</div><div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_2_5 et_pb_column_15  et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough et-last-child">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_module et_pb_cta_1 et_pb_promo  et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_promo_description"><h3 class="et_pb_module_header">Become An Artist</h3><div><ul class="ul1">
<li class="li1" style="text-align: left;"><span style="color: rgba(89, 89, 89, 0.97);">Register to create a 4×4, 6×6, or 10×10 square on your own, with a partner or a group. The deadline is COMING SOON (will close sooner if all spots are filled).</span></li>
<li class="li1" style="text-align: left;"><span style="color: rgba(89, 89, 89, 0.97);">If you register by May 31, you’ll have the opportunity to take part in an Art Show hosted by Central Rappahannock Regional Library <a href="https://www.google.com/maps/place/Central+Rappahannock+Regional+Library+Howell+Branch/@38.3628442,-77.4998017,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m6!3m5!1s0x89b6ebb417fa1b7b:0x64528d33f17934c4!8m2!3d38.36284!4d-77.497613!16s%2Fg%2F1tg519jg" style="color: rgba(89, 89, 89, 0.97);">Howell Branch</a> during July and August.</span></li>
<li class="li1" style="text-align: left;"><span style="color: rgba(89, 89, 89, 0.97);">Participate in a workshop with the 2025 Featured Artist, “The Chalking Dad,” to get a feel for the festival and learn some tricks from an experienced artist. The in-person workshop (Via Tutori) will be held at <a href="https://www.google.com/maps/place/Central+Rappahannock+Regional+Library+Howell+Branch/@38.3628442,-77.4998017,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m6!3m5!1s0x89b6ebb417fa1b7b:0x64528d33f17934c4!8m2!3d38.36284!4d-77.497613!16s%2Fg%2F1tg519jg" style="color: rgba(89, 89, 89, 0.97);">Howell Library</a>, Thursday, August 7, 5:30-7:30</span></li>
<li class="li1" style="text-align: left;"><span style="color: rgba(89, 89, 89, 0.97);">Because our sponsors believe in supporting the arts, there is no charge for the artists, and materials are included.</span></li>
<li class="li1" style="text-align: left;"><span style="color: rgba(89, 89, 89, 0.97);">There will be an artist’s reception and materials pick-up on Friday, September 26 at <a href="https://www.splcstafford.org/" style="color: rgba(89, 89, 89, 0.97);">St. Peter’s Lutheran Church</a> in Stafford.</span></li>
</ul>
<p style="text-align: center;"></div></div>

			</div><div class="et_pb_module et_pb_cta_2 et_pb_promo  et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_promo_description"><h3 class="et_pb_module_header">Why Become A Volunteer?</h3><div><p>Have you ever wanted to be part of a big, exciting art show, but drawing isn’t your thing? Via Colori Stafford is your opportunity to see it all from the inside. Volunteers are essential to making it an amazing, family-friendly event to celebrate the arts and the creative process and volunteers are absolutely critical to making this festival happen. In fact, WE are volunteers!</p></div></div>
				
			</div><div class="et_pb_button_module_wrapper et_pb_button_7_wrapper et_pb_button_alignment_left et_pb_module ">
				<a class="et_pb_button et_pb_button_7 et_pb_bg_layout_light" href="https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSe8PkYWlDnWIClduC9rQ4M8H3Tl1NUvNCTDs50TZKDnLqiqfw/viewform?usp=header" target="_blank">Become A Volunteer</a>
			</div>
			</div>
				
				
				
				
			</div>
				
				
			</div><div class="et_pb_section et_pb_section_4 et_pb_with_background et_section_regular" >
				
				
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_row et_pb_row_11 et_animated">
				<div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_3_5 et_pb_column_18  et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_module et_pb_image et_pb_image_9">
				
				
				
				
				<span class="et_pb_image_wrap has-box-shadow-overlay"><div class="box-shadow-overlay"></div><img loading="lazy" decoding="async" width="2379" height="2560" src="https://vcstafford.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/IMG_8393-scaled.webp" alt="Why should I sponsor an artist?" title="chalk butterfly drawing" srcset="https://vcstafford.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/IMG_8393-scaled.webp 2379w, https://vcstafford.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/IMG_8393-1280x1377.webp 1280w, https://vcstafford.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/IMG_8393-980x1055.webp 980w, https://vcstafford.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/IMG_8393-480x517.webp 480w" sizes="(min-width: 0px) and (max-width: 480px) 480px, (min-width: 481px) and (max-width: 980px) 980px, (min-width: 981px) and (max-width: 1280px) 1280px, (min-width: 1281px) 2379px, 100vw" class="wp-image-1034" /></span>
			</div>
			</div><div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_2_5 et_pb_column_19  et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough et-last-child">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_module et_pb_cta_3 et_pb_promo  et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_promo_description"><h3 class="et_pb_module_header">Why should I sponsor an artist?</h3><div><p>Via Colori® offers you at least one advantage not found at other festivals. At most art shows, the public sees the sponsor’s name once. But, because Via Colori artists are creating the work on the pavement during the festival, it changes each time the public passes. People return again and again to mark the progress of the work, and they see your name on a street label above the artwork signifying your donation.</p>
<p>Your sponsorship will be listed on our Square Sponsors Board, which prominently highlights all of our donors. You’ll also have access to our Sponsor/Artist Respite tent throughout the event, and you are welcome to provide small promotional notes/items to display on the tables in that tent.The main benefit is that you directly help our beneficiaries – the cultural, educational, student leadership, and student aid projects of Stafford County Public Schools.  All donations/sponsorships (monetary/gifts) are tax-deductible and a receipt will be provided for your records.</p>
<p>If you are interested in a Major Sponsorship with greater print, social media, and/or radio promotional benefits, contact us at <a href="mailto:ViaColoriSales@gmail.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener">ViaColoriSales@gmail.com</a>.</p></div></div>
				
			</div><div class="et_pb_button_module_wrapper et_pb_button_8_wrapper et_pb_button_alignment_left et_pb_button_alignment_tablet_center et_pb_button_alignment_phone_center et_pb_module ">
				<a class="et_pb_button et_pb_button_8 et_pb_bg_layout_light" href="https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdwA5DWfomMxOuK4YcEL8nbhHWmDQyX-ybE6HBLR1ODu1DN1w/viewform?usp=header" target="_blank">Sponsor a Square</a>
			</div>
			</div>
				
				
				
				
			</div>
				
				
			</div><div class="et_pb_section et_pb_section_5 et_pb_with_background et_section_regular" >
				
				
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_row et_pb_row_12">
				<div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_4_4 et_pb_column_20  et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough et-last-child">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_7  et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_text_inner"><h3>What is</h3>
<h2>Via Colori®?</h2></div>
			</div>
			</div>
				
				
				
				
			</div><div class="et_pb_row et_pb_row_13 et_animated">
				<div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_3_5 et_pb_column_21  et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_module et_pb_video et_pb_video_1">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_video_box">
				<video controls>
					<source type="video/mp4" src="https://vcstafford.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/Via-Colori-Stafford-2023.mp4" />
					
				</video></div>
				
			</div>
			</div><div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_2_5 et_pb_column_22  et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough et-last-child">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_module et_pb_cta_4 et_pb_promo  et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_promo_description"><div><p>The Via Colori® Street Painting Festival is the modern-day version of a centuries-old tradition in which dozens of volunteer artists create large-scale pastel artworks directly on the pavement of our county’s streets. In 2025, Via Colori® Stafford will be held at the Stafford Regional Airport in Stafford, Virginia, a location that provides plenty of parking and space to spread out.</p>
<p>Bring the entire family to watch the artists in progress, enjoy music on the Via Musica stage, and visit nonprofit organizations’ booths and food vendors. Kids will love Via Bambini, where they’ll get to create their own works of art! Via Colori® Stafford is hosted by Discover Stafford Museum & Cultural Center and the Rotary clubs of North Stafford and Stafford with support from our sponsors.</p></div></div>
				
			</div>
			</div>
				
				
				
				
			</div><div class="et_pb_row et_pb_row_14 et_animated">

				</video></div>
				
			</div>

				<div class="et_pb_promo_description"><div><p>Scott Mayausky, Stafford County Commissioner of Revenue and previous Chairman of Discover Stafford County Museum & Cultural Center, talks about the magic of Via Colori® Stafford.</p></div></div>

<script id="wix-first-paint">
    if (window.ResizeObserver &&
        (!window.PerformanceObserver || !PerformanceObserver.supportedEntryTypes || PerformanceObserver.supportedEntryTypes.indexOf('paint') === -1)) {
        new ResizeObserver(function (entries, observer) {
            entries.some(function (entry) {
                var contentRect = entry.contentRect;
                if (contentRect.width > 0 && contentRect.height > 0) {
                    requestAnimationFrame(function (now) {
                        window.wixFirstPaint = now;
                        dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent('wixFirstPaint'));
                    });
                    observer.disconnect();
                    return true;
                }
            });
        }).observe(document.body);
    }
</script>

		<div class="wpb_wrapper">
			<p>Food and Fun is both the event and food truck schedule all in one!</p>
<p>Local Hero Nights are on Tuesdays every week. We at Adventure appreciate all who serve the public so every Tuesday we offer 20% off beer both in-house and to-go for active and retired military, police, fire, emergency, hospital staff and teachers from 3-9 pm.</p>
<p>Want to plan an event with us?  Send an email to <a href="mailto:events@adventurebrewing.com">events@adventurebrewing.com</a>.</p>
<p>You can always bring in your own food to enjoy with your Adventure!  We’ve partnered with the BEST food trucks in the area to make your visit even better!</p>
